women.name: Marie Curie
women.title: Physicist & Chemist
women.fact: First person to win Nobel Prizes in two different sciences.

women.name: Amelia Earhart
women.title: Aviator
women.fact: First woman to fly solo across the Atlantic Ocean.

women.name: Rosa Parks
women.title: Civil Rights Activist
women.fact: Her courage on a bus helped spark the civil rights movement.

women.name: Ada Lovelace
women.title: Mathematician & Programmer
women.fact: Wrote the first computer program in history.

women.name: Frida Kahlo
women.title: Artist
women.fact: Created 55 self-portraits showing her unique artistic vision.

women.name: Jane Goodall
women.title: Primatologist
women.fact: Spent 60+ years studying and protecting wild chimpanzees.

women.name: Malala Yousafzai
women.title: Education Activist
women.fact: Youngest person ever to win the Nobel Peace Prize at age 17.

women.name: Katherine Johnson
women.title: NASA Mathematician
women.fact: Her math helped send astronauts to the Moon and back safely.

women.name: Harriet Tubman
women.title: Abolitionist & Freedom Fighter
women.fact: Led 70+ enslaved people to freedom on the Underground Railroad.

women.name: Maya Angelou
women.title: Poet & Author
women.fact: Her words inspired millions to find strength in their stories.
